front.title: IEEE Guide for Partial Discharge Measurement in Liquid- Filled Power Transformers and Shunt Reactors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The detection and measurement by the wide-band apparent charge method of partial discharges occurring in liquid-filled power transformers and shunt reactors during dielectric tests are covered. The standard covers the measuring instrument, calibrator characteristics, test circuits, calibration procedure, and partial discharge measurement during induced-voltage tests.<>
